attributes.review: I can’t tell you how hard this app is to use. I barely could navigate it without getting some sort of add. Not to mention it took almost two days to download. I’ve never had a problem like this with any of the other apps on my phone. It’s super unreliable and over all it’s not worth the download...

attributes.review: i don’t remember much from the first download. i tried to get it but it took so long that i banged my head against the nearest wall as hard as i could because all i wanted was to receive updates about trumps campaign and the stupid app wouldn’t download. after about the fifth bang i passed out and i woke up 2 weeks later to find my phone absolutely destroyed and flooded with kanye 2020 campaign ads which is not possible because it’s kanye west and he would never run for president unless there was something like a cursed app to make it happen. take this down immediately.

attributes.review: If it was possible to give it no stars I would do that option. This app took forever to download and it had racist content on it. It also crashed on me multiple times when I was trying to educate myself for the election. I deleted it within an hour of it actually downloading.
